intro: Elatostema fengshanense, commonly known as the Fengshan Elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is native to China, specifically found in the mountainous regions of Yunnan Province. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of tiny, white flowers. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments within forest understories. Elatostema fengshanense is noted for its unique morphology and is of interest to botanists studying plant diversity in subtropical ecosystems.
